name: CPDashboardButton
desc: A shortcut button for placement on the CarPlay Dashboard.

items.name: init(titleVariants: [String], subtitleVariants: [String], image: UIImage, handler: ((CPDashboardButton) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Creates a dashboard button that displays a title, an optional subtitle, and an image.

items.name: var titleVariants: [String]
items.desc: The array of title variants for the button.

items.name: var subtitleVariants: [String]
items.desc: The array of subtitle variants for the button.
